name: Air Traffic And Navigation Services
about: The Air Traffic and Navigation Services (ATNS) Aviation Training Academy is a premier institution dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training. As a leading Air Traffic Management solutions provider, ATNS is responsible for air traffic control in approximately 10% of the world’s airspace, including South Africa and parts of the Southern Indian and Atlantic Oceans. The academy offers a wide range of aviation-related and safety-related courses, including Air Traffic Services, Engineering, and management training. As an IATA regional training provider, ATNS ATA has been awarded IATA’s Worldwide Top Regional Training Partner multiple times. The academy is fully accredited and registered on the National Qualifications Framework, offering up to three-year national diploma-level courses. With a commitment to diversity and excellence, ATNS ATA ensures safe, efficient, and sustainable air traffic management solutions, making it a trusted partner in aviation training globally.
